attributes.action: Nationalize all utilities and public services currently owned privately.
attributes.additional_details: This is because the system is broken, we only get services that continually get worse while we see the owners and executives continue to get pay-outs. Using the fact they have guarantee income and inelastic demand in what basically boils down to a state sanction monopoly. This government should be bold and radical in tackling the challenges facing this country. It criminal what these private owners are doing to our country.
attributes.background: I believe that the government should nationalize all utilities and public services currently owned privately. Through the process of asset forfeiture.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Nationalise all public utilities: water, energy, telecoms, postal and buses
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714210
